result.eng: It will be done in its own proper time.
result.ga: Déanfar in am agus i dtráth é
result.orig: Déanfar in am agus i dtráth é
result.html: Déanfar in am agus i dtráth éIt will be done in its own proper time.
result.ponchtml: Déanfar in am agus i dtráṫ éIt will be done in its own proper time.

result.eng: I hadn't had any proper time to get down to it until now.
result.ga: Ní raibh am ceart agam le tabhairt faoi go dtí seo
result.orig: Ní raibh am ceart agam le tabhairt faoi go dtí seo
result.html: Ní raibh am ceart agam le tabhairt faoi go dtí seoI hadn't had any proper time to get down to it until now.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ am ceart agam le taḃairt faoi go dtí seoI hadn't had any proper time to get down to it until now.

result.eng: There's no way you'll get proper monetary reward for that.
result.ga: Níl luach saothair ar bith le baint as
result.orig: Níl luach saothair ar bith le baint as
result.html: Níl luach saothair ar bith le baint asThere's no way you'll get proper monetary reward for that.
result.ponchtml: Níl luaċ saoṫair ar biṫ le baint asThere's no way you'll get proper monetary reward for that.
